    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String password, String saltString)
      Generate a hash of (text_password + salt) using PBKDF2WithHmacSHA1 cryptographic system
      Parameters:
      password - password typed by users
      saltString - random string added to password before doing hash
      Returns:
      a hashed password - String

    • addStudent

      public static void addStudent(String name, String studentNumber, String email, String password, int startYear, int endYear)
      Adds a student to the list.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of student.
      studentNumber - The student number of student.
      email - The email of student.
      password - The password of student.
      startYear - The starting year of studies of student.
      endYear - The estimated completion of studies of student.

      Parameters:
      studentNumber - Student number of the student.
      Returns:
      True if student was found, false otherwise.

    • validatePassword

      public static boolean validatePassword(String email, String password)
      Check if the provided email and password are correct
      Parameters:
      email - The email types by user
      password - password typed by user
      Returns:
      True if student with same email found and hash of typed password and stored-hashed password are the same, returns false otherwise.

    • updatePassword

      public static void updatePassword(String password)
      Updates the password of student profile.
      Parameters:
      password - The new password to be set.

    • readFromFile

      public boolean readFromFile(String fileName)
      Reads data from the json file to populate students list.
      Specified by:
      readFromFile in interface iReadAndWriteToFile
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file where students data is saved.
      Returns:
      True if the file is found and data is read successfully, return false otherwise.

    • writeToFile

      public boolean writeToFile(String fileName) throws IOException
      Writes the updated students list to the given json file.
      Specified by:
      writeToFile in interface iReadAndWriteToFile
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the json file to write data to.
      Returns:
      True if the file is found and data is written successfully, otherwise returns false.
